c74object.name: weft.repeater
c74object.digest: Transform a sequence by applying a repeater sequence
c74object.description: Transform a sequence by applying a repeater sequence.

method.name: list
method.digest: In left inlet, sets the primary sequence; in right inlet, sets the repeats pattern that transforms the primary sequence
method.description: In left inlet, sets the primary sequence; in right inlet, sets the repeats pattern that transforms the primary sequence.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Send out the transformed sequence with repeats applied
method.description: Send out the transformed sequence with repeats applied.
